name: Wheel Of Fortune Unity 2D
description:
Project base on an tutorial from: http://www.theappguruz.com/blog/how-to-make-a-wheel-of-fortune-in-unity-the-easiest-way

======== To Spin Wheel: Please press 0 to 9 from your keyboard. =======

I've adjusted somethings to suitable for my project like:
- spin clockwise or not.

- select stick angle.

-implement on Canvas

You can find project in here
github: https://github.com/huynhdoquang/WheelOfFortune
